actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to provide for payments in lieu of taxes to local governments by the Administrator of General Services based upon the amount of certain tax exempt property owned by the United States and foreign governments within such locality.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of General Services to make payments to local governments based on the amount of tax exempt public and foreign lands within the boundaries of such governmental units.

titles.title: A bill to provide for payments in lieu of taxes to local governments by the Administrator of General Services based upon the amount of certain tax exempt property owned by the United States and foreign governments within such locality.
